ModMetaData.name: BMX and Biker Outfits
ModMetaData.author: Lil Scoot
ModMetaData.description:
Scoots Protective Apparel; BMX and Biker Attire! is a mod that brings the popular designs of BMX and Motorcyclist apparel to the Rim! With 6 unique pairs of attire, your colonists will no longer need to worry about splitting their skulls open from extreme high-speed crashes!
This mod was made in preparation for Smash Phil's Vehicles+ Framework.
